instruction: Create a storyboard to communicate a given message
input: Message: Technology is transforming the way we learn
output:
A storyboard that tells the story of technology transforming the way we learn may include: 

1. A student sitting in a classroom with other peers, reading from a traditional textbook.
2. The same student in the same classroom, now using an iPad or laptop to access an interactive lesson.
3. Another student using virtual reality to learn about a particular concept.
4. An older student, who is now taking an online class to further their education.
5. A group of students collaborating on an assignment through a video call.
6. A student doing research for an assignment by searching for relevant material on the internet.
7. A student who is now able to access a wealth of information from any location, with just the click of a button.
8. A student giving a presentation on a project they completed using technology, to the rest of the class.
